name: Bounce Rage
description:
Bounce Rage is a 2d platformer game created by 4 students of UNICAP digital games course. In this game, you play as an amusing briefcase throughout the inspired scenario of Recife and Olinda, two big cities from the northeast of Brazil. Your objective is to go as further as you can, collecting pages along the way in order to buy upgrades. Be careful with the obstacles as you will die if hit them in the front, instead you should bounce on top of them to keep going and make combos.

Game Designer - https://lilshopa.itch.io

Programmer: https://leniton.itch.io/

Sound Designer: https://zalvin.itch.io

Artist: https://alexandre-sampaio.itch.io/
